# Ejercicio 1

Resolved el siguiente sistema de ecuaciones lineales:

$$
\left
  \{ 
    \begin{array}{rrrrcr}
       x_1 & - 2x_2 & +  \hfill x_3 & - \hfill x_4 & = &  3 \\
      2x_1 & - 3x_2 & + 2x_3 & - \hfill x_4 & = & -1 \\
      3x_1 & - 5 x_2 & + 3x_3 & - 4x_4 & = &  3 \\
      - \hfill x_1 & +  \hfill x_2 & - \hfill x_3 & + 2x_4 & = &  5
    \end{array}
\right.
$$


# Ejercicio 2

Resolved la siguiente ecuación matricial:

$$
AX + B = CX - X + D
$$

donde

## Apartado (a)



$$
A =
\begin{pmatrix}
  1 & \hfill  0 \\
  0 &        -1
  \end{pmatrix}
  \qquad B =
\begin{pmatrix}
  1 & 3 \\
  2 & 0
\end{pmatrix}
\qquad C =
\begin{pmatrix}
  \hfill 4 & -2 \\
         -3 & -5
\end{pmatrix}
\qquad D =
\begin{pmatrix}
  1 & \hfill  3 \\
  4 &        -2
\end{pmatrix}
$$

## Apartado (b)

$$
A =
\begin{pmatrix}
  1 & \hfill  2 & 1 \\
  0 &        -3 & 1 \\
  1 & \hfill  1 & 1
\end{pmatrix}
\qquad B =
\begin{pmatrix}
  \hfill  1 & 3 & 0 \\
  \hfill  0 & 2 & 0 \\
         -1 & 0 & 1
\end{pmatrix}
\qquad C =
\begin{pmatrix}
  \hfill  3 & 0 & \hfill  2 \\
         -2 & 1 &        -1 \\
         -1 & 1 & \hfill  2
\end{pmatrix}
\qquad D =
\begin{pmatrix}
1 & 3 & \hfill  5 \\
4 & 0 &        -2 \\
0 & 0 & \hfill  1
\end{pmatrix}
$$

# Ejercicio 3

Di de qué tipo de sistema se trata y, en caso de ser compatible, resuélvelo:

## Apartado (a)

$$
\left
  \{ 
    \begin{array}{rrrrrr}
      6x_1 & - 3x_2 & - 3x_3 & + 2x_4 & = & 32 \\
       x_1 & - 2x_2 & - 2x_3 & + \hfill x_4 & = &  4 \\
       x_1 & - \hfill x_2 & - \hfill x_3 & + \hfill x_4 & = &  6 \\
       x_1 & + \hfill x_2 & + \hfill x_3 & - \hfill x_4 & = &  5
    \end{array}
\right.
$$

## Apartado (b)

$$
\left
  \{ 
    \begin{array}{rrrcr}
       x & + \hfill 2y & + \hfill 3z & = &  4 \\
      8x & + \hfill 7y & + \hfill 6z & = &  5 \\
      9x & + 11y & + 10z & = & 12
    \end{array}
\right.
$$

## Apartado (c)

$$
\left
  \{ 
    \begin{array}{rrrrr}
        x & + 2y & + \hfill 3z & = &  4 \\
      - y &      & + \hfill 2z & = &  0 \\
        x & - 3y & + 13z & = & -1
    \end{array}
\right.
$$

## Apartado (d)

$$
\left
  \{ 
    \begin{array}{rrrrrrr}
      3x_1 & + \hfill x_2 & + 4x_3 & + \hfill x_4 &      & = & 0 \\
      5x_1 &        & + 2x_3 &        & + 64 & = & 0 \\
           & - \hfill x_2 &        & - 2x_4 &      & = & 0 \\
      3x_1 & + 2x_2 & + 3x_3 & + \hfill x_4 &      & = & 0
    \end{array}
\right.
$$
